dev-1.x.name: drupal/we_love_reviews

security-coverage.message: Dev releases are not covered by Drupal security advisories.

dev-1.x.description:
This module NOT ONLY adds schema.org LocalBusiness contact info markup to the head section of each of your Drupal pages
in JSON/LD format, BUT IT INCLUDES the up-to-date overall rating value and the total number of reviews as gathered through the ReputationCRM.com API.
Want more customer feedback for your business? For more info, head over to Reputation Aegis.

1.0.0.name: drupal/we_love_reviews

security-coverage.message: Covered by Drupal's security advisory policy
